data.text: @dave_andersen Do you have an age break down? I'm hearing a lot of anecdotal stories about grade school outbreaks over the last two weeks.

@fugacity2 Yes - it's between 10 and 50.
Substantial is 50 to 100

PA-wide hospital census: Using 16660 med/surg beds - 147 less than last Monday. 17 more free ICU beds statewide than a week ago. Continued excellent progress.

Very close to CDC "moderate" transmission levels: Allegheny threshold is 86 cases/day; PA threshold is 914 cases/day.

Allegheny County daily vaccines wiggle down to 417 1st+2nd doses, 340 booster doses/day
(5 day lagged 7 day avg)

Fully vaccinated %s:

Allegheny County: 67.3% (state data), 49% of those are boosted.

PA counties with full ICU beds:

Clearfield (3 +covid patients in ICU)

Pennsylvania reports 966 new cases.
Hospitalizations are -22 to 1038.
ICUs are -24 to 167 (79% full).
7 day avg drops to 970-990 cases/day
Transmission risk: Substantial

Today's results reflect 15679 new PCR test results https://t.co/7DoCRue1Yk
